name: dftbplus

new_version_errors.20.2:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '20.2' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/{{ name }}/scalapackfx/archive/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'
 - could not hash URL template 'https://github.com/{{ name }}/mpifx/archive/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dftbplus" %}
{% set version = "22.1" %}
{% set build = 0 %}
{% set mpi = mpi or "nompi" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/{{ name }}/{{ name }}/releases/download/{{ version }}/dftbplus-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: 02daca6f4c6372656598f3ba0311110c8e473c87c8d934d7bb276feaa4cc1c82

{% if mpi == "nompi" %}
{% set build = build + 100 %}
{% endif %}
build:
  number: {{ build }}
  skip: True  # [win]

  {% if mpi != "nompi" %}
  {% set mpi_prefix = "mpi_" + mpi %}
  {% else %}
  {% set mpi_prefix = "nompi" %}
  {% endif %}
  string: "{{ mpi_prefix }}_h{{ PKG_HASH }}_{{ build }}"

  {% if mpi != "nompi" %}
  run_exports:
    - {{ name }} * {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
  {% endif %}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
    - fypp
    - pkg-config
    - llvm-openmp  # [osx]
    - libgomp  # [linux]
    - wget  # [build_platform == target_platform]
  host:
    - {{ mpi }}  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - mpifx * mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - scalapack  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - scalapackfx * mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - elsi 2.8.2 mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - libnegf * {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - arpack  # [mpi == "nompi"]
    - mctc-lib
    - simple-dftd3
    - tblite
    - libmbd * {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - plumed * {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - chimes-calculator
    - libblas
    - liblapack
  run:
    - {{ mpi }}  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - {{ pin_compatible('mpifx', max_pin='x.x') }} mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - scalapack  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - {{ pin_compatible('scalapackfx', max_pin='x.x') }} mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - {{ pin_compatible('elsi', max_pin='x.x') }} mpi_{{ mpi }}_*  # [mpi != "nompi"]
    - {{ pin_compatible('libnegf', max_pin='x.x') }} {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - arpack  # [mpi == "nompi"]
    - {{ pin_compatible('mctc-lib', max_pin='x.x') }}
    - {{ pin_compatible('simple-dftd3', max_pin='x.x') }}
    - {{ pin_compatible('tblite', max_pin='x.x') }}
    - {{ pin_compatible('libmbd', max_pin='x.x') }} {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - {{ pin_compatible('plumed', max_pin='x.x') }} {{ mpi_prefix }}_*
    - {{ pin_compatible('chimes-calculator', max_pin='x.x') }}

test:
  requires:
    - pkg-config
  commands:
    - export OMPI_MCA_plm=isolated OMPI_MCA_btl_vader_single_copy_mechanism=none OMPI_MCA_rmaps_base_oversubscribe=yes  # [mpi == "openmpi"]
    - pkg-config {{ name }} --exact-version {{ version }}
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/dftb+
    - $PREFIX/bin/dftb+ | grep "No input file"  # [mpi == "nompi" and build_platform == target_platform]
    - mpiexec $PREFIX/bin/dftb+ | grep "No input file"  # [mpi != "nompi" and build_platform == target_platform]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libdftbplus${SHLIB_EXT}

about:
  home: https://{{ name }}.org
  license: LGPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - "LICENSE"
    - "COPYING"
    - "COPYING.LESSER"
    - "external/fsockets/LICENSE"
    - "external/mudpack/LICENSE"
    - "external/xmlf90/LICENSE"
  summary: "DFTB+ general package for performing fast atomistic simulations"
  doc_url: https://{{ name }}-recipes.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/{{ name }}/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aradi
    - awvwgk
    - bhourahine
